/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling city street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. The buildings lining the street are tall and modern, their glass facades reflecting the sunlight, adding a touch of brilliance to the scene. 

The street itself is a hive of activity. Cars of various colors are scattered across the road, some parked neatly by the side of the street while others are in motion, weaving their way through the city's arteries. Pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalks, going about their day, adding a human element to the urban landscape.

The perspective of the image is particularly striking. Taken from a low angle, it offers a view that looks up at the towering buildings and the expansive sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the cityscape.
